title: Phase Eight logotype
content:
I am looking for this typeface, _if it is a typeface_, or something similar.  
Thanks in advance,  
Tim

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Phase Eight copy.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013151206/http:/typophile.com/files/Phase%20Eight%20copy.gif) | 6.19 KB |
author: timd

comments.content: If this indeed is a typeface, it must be an amateurish freeware font as you can tell by the crude letterforms and lack of proper optical correction. For example see how the curves transition into straight lines.

\>amateurish

My instant reaction on being asked to id it.

Tim
Have you checked DaFont? You might find it there.

Well, hasn't house's [Simian Orangutan](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013151206/http:/www.identifont.com/show?7ED) (in a lighter weight maybe?) some similarities? Not being amateurish I mean, more from the overall look …

Indeed a good choice, I’ll suggest it.  
Thanks for your efforts gents.

Tim
